```{r, echo=FALSE}
setwd("/home/dan/Desktop/GitRepo/COLL_100/labs/lab5_cga/Data")
ClimateData <- read.csv("x_203_mntmp_1446136697.csv")
library(ggmap)

map <- get_map(location = 'United States', zoom = 4)
mapPoints <- ggmap(map) +
geom_point(aes(x = ClimateData$LONGITUDE, y = ClimateData$LATITUDE))

```

```{r, echo=TRUE}
mapPoints
```


```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(xts)
ClimateData$DATE <- as.Date(as.character(ClimateData$DATE))

ClimateDailyAg <- aggregate(VALUE ~ DATE,
          data = ClimateData,
          FUN = mean)

ClimateTimeSeries <- xts(ClimateDailyAg$VALUE, order.by = ClimateDailyAg$DATE)

ClimateTimeStep <- apply.yearly(ClimateTimeSeries,mean)

```

```{r, echo=TRUE}
library(dygraphs)
dygraph(ClimateTimeStep, main = "United States Temperatures") %>% 
  dyRangeSelector(dateWindow = c("1960-01-01", "1990-01-01"))
```
